answers.answer: Hello,the most effective diet for controlling diabetes is one that is low carb, moderate protein, and high in healthy fats.You can look up paleo (their approach is quite diabetes friendly), or mediterannean (though you may want to reduce the bread, past, etc).
To control your diabetes there are many options. You can also search google for more details. And also you will be benefited from Home health clinic which is in the Uk.

question: How do you control your sugars?  What are some good diets
title: Controlling your sugars
